scripts.install:linux:staged: npm run install:linux:core && npm run install:linux:nrwl && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:apps: cd apps/ustad-web-chatbot && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../ustad-web-esinav && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../ustad-web-shell && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../ustad-web-yesildefter && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build:verbose: npx nx reset && npm run nx:build
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean && npm run install:linux:core && npm run install:linux:nrwl && npm run install:apps && npm run build:verbose
scripts.start:chatbot: cd apps/ustad-web-chatbot && ([ -d "venv" ] || (python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && ([ -f "requirements.txt" ] || echo "flask==3.0.2\nflask-cors==4.0.0\npython-dotenv==1.0.1" > requirements.txt))) && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && ./start-flask.sh
scripts.setup:linux: npm run clean && npm run install:linux:staged && npm run build:verbose
scripts.setup:macos: npm run clean && npm run install:macos && npm run build:verbose
scripts.setup:fresh: npm run clean && SKIP_DOWNLOAD=true SKIP_NATIVE_DEPENDENCIES=true npm install --legacy-peer-deps --force --ignore-scripts nx@19.8.4 @nx/workspace@19.8.4 @nx/next@19.8.4 @nx/react@19.8.4 && npm run serve:esinav:nodaemon
scripts.start:linux: npm run setup:linux && npm run dev
scripts.start:macos: npm run setup:macos && npm run dev
scripts.nx:clean: rm -rf node_modules/@nx node_modules/@nrwl node_modules/nx node_modules/@yarnpkg .nx/cache && rm -rf node_modules/.nx* && rm -rf node_modules/.cache
scripts.nx:download: mkdir -p .nx-temp && cd .nx-temp && curl -L -o nx.tgz https://registry.npmjs.org/nx/-/nx-19.8.4.tgz && curl -L -o next.tgz https://registry.npmjs.org/@nrwl/next/-/next-19.8.4.tgz && curl -L -o react.tgz https://registry.npmjs.org/@nrwl/react/-/react-19.8.4.tgz && curl -L -o workspace.tgz https://registry.npmjs.org/@nx/workspace/-/workspace-19.8.4.tgz
scripts.nx:setup: npm cache clean --force && npm run nx:clean && npm run nx:download && npm run nx:verify && npm run nx:install:local && npm run nx:install:deps && npm run nx:init && npm run nx:cleanup
scripts.serve:esinav:nodaemon: NODE_ENV=development NX_DAEMON=false npx nx serve ustad-web-esinav --verbose
scripts.setup:clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && SKIP_DOWNLOAD=true SKIP_NATIVE_DEPENDENCIES=true npm install --legacy-peer-deps --force --ignore-scripts nx@19.8.4 @nx/workspace@19.8.4 @nx/next@19.8.4 @nx/react@19.8.4 && npm run serve:esinav:nodaemon
scripts.serve:clean: npm run clean && npm run install:nx --verbose && npm run serve:all
